sla.businessHours: Monday - Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM (Your Local Time)
sla.escalation: If your ticket is not updated within the SLA, reply to the ticket email or contact your Partner Manager directly.

tickets.subject: Deal conflict with another partner on Acme Corp
tickets.description: Another partner has registered Acme Corporation but we have an existing relationship. Need conflict resolution.

updates.author: Sarah Johnson
updates.message: Reviewing deal registration timestamps and relationship history. Will update by EOD.

tickets.subject: SSO integration failing for GlobalHealth
tickets.description: Customer's Azure AD SSO integration is returning SAML assertion errors. Need technical assistance.

updates.author: Mike Chen
updates.message: Looking into the SAML configuration. Can you share the Azure AD app registration settings?

updates.author: Mike Chen
updates.message: Waiting for customer to provide Azure AD configuration screenshots.

tickets.subject: Commission not showing for TechVenture deal
tickets.description: Deal D-2024-085 closed on Dec 15 but commission is not appearing in my revenue dashboard.

updates.author: Finance Team
updates.message: Investigating the commission record for this deal.

updates.author: Finance Team
updates.message: Commission has been processed and is now visible in your Revenue dashboard. The delay was due to customer payment confirmation.

tickets.subject: How to check my tier progress?
tickets.description: I want to know how close I am to reaching Platinum tier. Where can I see this?

updates.author: Partner Success
updates.message: You can view your tier progress on the Dashboard page. The 'Partner Tier' card shows your current status and requirements for the next tier. For detailed criteria, check your Training page - completing required certifications is part of tier advancement.

tickets.subject: Need manufacturing industry pitch deck
tickets.description: I have several manufacturing prospects. Is there an industry-specific pitch deck available?

knowledgeBase.title: Deal Registration Rules
knowledgeBase.summary: How deal registration works, protection periods, and conflict resolution
knowledgeBase.content: Deal registration protects your opportunity for 90 days from registration date. To register a deal, you must have a qualified opportunity with customer engagement. Conflicts are resolved based on registration timestamp and documented customer relationship.

knowledgeBase.title: Deal Conflict Resolution Process
knowledgeBase.summary: What happens when two partners register the same customer
knowledgeBase.content: When a conflict occurs, our Partner team reviews: 1) Registration timestamps, 2) Documented customer engagement history, 3) Customer preference if applicable. Resolution typically takes 2-3 business days. You'll be notified via email and ticket update.

knowledgeBase.title: Partner Discount Guidelines
knowledgeBase.summary: Understanding your discount levels and approval requirements
knowledgeBase.content: Your discount authority is based on your partner tier. Gold partners can apply up to 20% without approval. Discounts above your threshold require Partner Manager approval (24-hour SLA). See the Quotes & Pricing page for detailed rules.

knowledgeBase.title: Commission Payout Schedule
knowledgeBase.summary: When and how you get paid
knowledgeBase.content: Commissions are paid monthly on the 15th. A commission moves to 'Approved' status after customer payment is confirmed. Approved commissions are included in the next payout cycle. Minimum payout threshold is $500.

knowledgeBase.title: Commission Calculation
knowledgeBase.content: Commission is calculated as a percentage of deal value based on your partner tier: Registered (5%), Silver (10%), Gold (15%), Platinum (20%). Large deals ($100K+) may have adjusted rates. See your deal details for specific rates.

knowledgeBase.title: SSO Setup Common Issues
knowledgeBase.content: Common SSO issues: 1) Incorrect ACS URL - ensure it matches exactly, 2) Certificate expiry - check IdP certificate validity, 3) Attribute mapping - user email must be in correct format. For detailed setup, see the Technical Implementation guide in Resources.

knowledgeBase.title: Tier Advancement Requirements
knowledgeBase.summary: What you need to reach the next partner tier
knowledgeBase.content: Tier advancement is based on: 1) Revenue targets (varies by tier), 2) Required certifications (Sales + Product for Silver, add Implementation for Gold), 3) Customer satisfaction scores. Check your Training page for certification progress.
